question: Who among the following was appointed election commissioner after Nasim Zaidi retired as chief election commissioner in July 2017?
explanation: AS officer and former bureaucrat, Sunil Arora, was appointed election commissioner. After Nasim Zaidi retired as chief election commissioner (CEC) in July, there was a vacancy in the Election Commission. While Achal Kumar Joti is the joint CEC, Om Prakash Rawat is the other election commissioner.
